import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../UI/Navbar-old'; import dudley from '../../assets/Joyce_Dudley.jpg' import news from '../../data/news'; import press from '../../data/press'; import covid from '../../assets/covid-banner.png' import backdrop from '../../assets/backdrop.jpeg' import victim from '../../assets/victim.png' import team from '../../assets/team.jpeg' import court from '../../assets/court calendar.jpeg' import faq from '../../assets/faq.jpg' import diversion from '../../assets/diversion.jpeg' import office from '../../assets/Office.png' import './Home.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ChevronRight } from 'react-bootstrap-icons'; class Home extends Component { render () { let pressData = press.slice(0, 10); let newsData = news.slice(0, 10); return (
Our Mission
To pursue truth and justice by employing the highest ethical standards in vigorously prosecuting the guilty, protecting the innocent, and preventing crime.
Meet Your DA
Joyce E. Dudley
District Attorney
Covid Update
In order to help protect the health and safety of our community, the District Attorney's Office is closed to the public until further notice.
If this is an emergency call 911. Otherwise, please call to schedule an appointment for the following.
Victim Services
Santa Barbara: (805) 568-2400
Santa Maria: (805) 568-2400
SM / Juvenile: (805) 568-2400
Restitution Payment
Santa Barbara: (805) 568-2400
Santa Maria: (805) 568-2400
SM / Juvenile: (805) 568-2400
Discovery Pickup
Santa Barbara: (805) 568-2400
Santa Maria: (805) 568-2400
SM / Juvenile: (805) 568-2400
Main Reception
Santa Barbara: (805) 568-2400
Santa Maria: (805) 568-2400
SM / Juvenile: (805) 568-2400
What does your DA's Office do?
Our mission is to pursue truth and justice by employing the highest ethical standards in vigorously prosecuting the guilty, protecting the innocent, and preventing crime.
Victim Services
Our Victim Adovates are available to ensure that crime victims and their family members are kept informed and supported throughout the criminal justice process.
Diversion Programs
Learn about how your DA's Office diverts cases away from criminal prosecution.
Find a Court Case
Stay up to date with the court calendar. Visit the court website to find a case.
Employment Opportunites
Interested in a career with the District Attorney's Office? View our list of careers.
FAQs
Were you the victim of a crime? Do you need to report a crime? We have a list of frequently asked questions that may help answer your question.
) } } export default Home;
